steps.goal: Find the latest news article about Samsung Electronics.
steps.deliverable: URL of the latest news article.

steps.goal: Fetch the content of the news article.
Summarize the content of the news article.
steps.deliverable: Summarized content of the news article.

steps.goal: Post the summarized content to the Slack channel 'agentic'.

collaboration_plan.notes: Finds, summarizes, and posts the latest news about Samsung Electronics to Slack.
